name: Deb-o-Matic
tagline: Automatic build machine for Debian source packages
body:
### Welcome to Deb-o-Matic! 
Deb-o-Matic is an easy to use utility to build Debian source packages, meant to help developers to automate the building of their packages with a tool that requires limited user interaction and a simple startup configuration.

It provides some useful features such as automatic chroot update, rebuilds of source packages, post-build checks, and much more. It is also extendable using modules that are loaded and executed during the build phases.

### Get source code
Grab the latest and greatest Deb-o-Matic software:

$ git clone https://github.com/debomatic/debomatic.git

### Bugs and feature request
Have you found a bug? Do you want more features to be added? Jump to the [issue tracker](https://github.com/debomatic/debomatic/issues)!

### Documentation
Documentation for Deb-o-Matic can be found on http://deb-o-matic.readthedocs.org
